name: Smith Scout Junior MIPS Helmet - Youths
description: Four seasons of safety, sized for young shredders. This helmet is ready to ride on snow, dirt or pavement. With a tough ABS outer, the Scout Junior can handle life on 2 wheels, skis or a board. MIPS (Multi-directional Impact Protection System) technology reduces the rotating forces on your head on the event of a crash, giving you peace of mind during strategic risk-taking on the hill. An easy elastic fit system, loads of vents and removeable earpads ensure this helmet stays in use all year long.ABS hardshell construction balances protection and strength with durability.EPS inner absorbs and dissipates energy from side impacts and collisions.Venting keeps airflow moving to control the climate inside.MIPS helps with the reduction of rotational forces in the event of a crash.Elastic fit system self-adjusts for each use.Removable ear pads make spring days less sweaty.Side release buckle for glove-friendly on/off.
